mapper.select: select count(*) from UserServer where ip = #{ip}

select fromHost,deviceTime,receivedAt,facility, priority,message,syslogTag,programname from UserServer, rsyslogmessages where UserServer.id = #{id} and ( (rsyslogmessages.fromHost="127.0.0.1" ) or (rsyslogmessages.fromHost=UserServer.ip)) order by rsyslogmessages.receivedAt desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select info.ip, hostname, hw,osver, version, corenum from info,UserServer where UserServer.id =#{id} and info.ip = UserServer.ip;
select count(*) from UserServer, rsyslogmessages where UserServer.id = #{id} and UserServer.ip = rsyslogmessages.fromHost order by rsyslogmessages.receivedAt
